resources.string: Please adjust the next audio tracks to your optional volume.
You will begin part of I/II
You will be required to adjust the volume of the second audio track you will hear. When you feel confident of the volume level you choose, please press \'Next\' to continue

string.name: intro_desc2
string.u: Once you pressed \'Next\', you will not be able to return and correct your decision.

resources.string: Press on \'Arrow\' when you ready to begin.
